credit_line: Gift of the artists in honor of Linda Shearer and in memory of Bishop, Dr. Preston R. Washington, Sr., Class of 1970
title: A Midsummer Night's Dream (after William Shakespeare), [Created with 4th-8th grade students in Clarksburg, Savoy and Florida Elementary Schools during Kidspace, Mass MoCA artist residency March 2005]
medium: watercolor, acrylic, paper, collage, Xerox on paper, on canvas
inscriptions: A Midsummer Night's Dream [Mendelssohm); Tim Rollins and K.O.S. in collaboration with elementary, jr. high and high school students in Savoy, Florida, Clarksburg and North, Mass. 2005
